field.name: ma_nguon
field.check: ma_nguon <> '' and ma_nguon not in (select ma_nguon from bikddmnguon)

field.name: chuyen_ton_kho
field.check: chuyen_ton_kho not in ('1', '0')⩓exists (select 1 from bikddmnguon b join bikdngct c on b.ma_ct = c.ma_ct and b.loai_ct = c.loai_ct where b.ma_nguon = @@table.ma_nguon and c.loai_nguon in ('40', '50', '60', '90') and @@table.chuyen_ton_kho = '1')

field.name: kieu_tao_lo
field.check: kieu_tao_lo <> '' and kieu_tao_lo not in (select ma_loai from dmloai where nhom = '11')⩓exists (select 1 from bikddmnguon b join bikdngct c on b.ma_ct = c.ma_ct and b.loai_ct = c.loai_ct where b.ma_nguon = @@table.ma_nguon and charindex(',' + @@table.kieu_tao_lo + ',', ',' + replace(c.gh_kieu_tao_lo, ' ', '') + ',') > 0)

field.name: pp_chat_luong
field.check: pp_chat_luong <> '' and pp_chat_luong not in (select ma_loai from dmloai where nhom = '12')⩓kd_dac_tinh = '0' and pp_chat_luong in('2', '3', '6')
